visual.name: datamap
visual.description: Data to map, made simple. Provide a new dimension to your data. Generate high impact stunning maps from your data in minutes.

dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Unique ID for features on the map, used to join data with external datasources.

dataRoles.name: longitude
dataRoles.description: Longitude or X coordinate for displaying point features on map.

dataRoles.name: latitude
dataRoles.description: Latitude or Y coordinate for displaying point features on map.

dataRoles.name: wkt
dataRoles.description: Well-known text for displaying geometries on map.

dataRoles.name: tooltip
dataRoles.description: Additional data fields to display as tooltip when hovered over map.

map.description: General map configuration such as base map and number of layers.

baseMap.description: A reference map on which data is displayed to provide visual context.

baseMapAPIKey.description: API key or access token to access protected base maps from Maptiler and mapbox.

numberOfLayers.description: Number of data layers for the map, ideally should be same as number of category fields. Controls number of data layer properties displayed.

projection.description: Projection, center and extent constraints configuration for map control.

showExtentsPanel.description: Applicable in Edit mode only. Displays a panel with current map center, zoom level and extent values. These values can be used to populate settings in this section.

projection.description:
Projection system in which the map is displayed, should be an EPSG projection code. Valid values can be looked up at https://epsg.io/. 
Map will be clipped to the projection's well defined extent.

centerLongitude.description: Longitude or X coordinate at which the map is centered, should be in same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map center coordinates.

centerLatitude.description: Latitude or Y coordinate at which the map is centered, should be in same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map center coordinates.

defaultZoomLevel.description: Zoom level at which map is initates, should be between 0 and 20.

constraintZoom.description: Prevent users from navigating the map beyond specified map extent.

constraintXMin.description: Minimum longitude or X coordinate to constrain the map, should be in the same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map extent values.

constraintYMin.description: Minimum latitude or Y coordinate to constrain the map, should be in the same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map extent values.

constraintXMax.description: Maximum longitude or X coordinate to constrain the map, should be in the same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map extent values.

constraintYMax.description: Maximum latitude or Y coordinate to constrain the map, should be in the same coordinate systems as Projection. 'Show Extent Values' can be used to get current map extent values.

mapControls.description: Configure controls displayed on the map such as zoom, selection and scale bar.

showZoom.description: Show zoom in and zoom out controls on map.

showSelection.description: Show freehand selection control on map.

scaleUnits.description: Units in which the scale bar is displayed.

attributionExpanded.description: Attribution control to display data attributions are expanded by default.

mapBehaviour.description: Configure map behaviour for various events.

zoomToVisible.description: Sets map extent to show all visible data when there are no highlights.

zoomToHighlight.description: Sets map extent to show only highlighted data when cross selection is made on other visuals.

zoomLevel.description: Limits maximum allowed zoom level when map zooms to visible or highlighted data. Map will not zoom closer than this value

highlightOnHover.description: Highlight features when mouse is hovered over them.

highlightSelected.description: Highlight features when they are selected by clicking on them or using selection tool.

allowInteraction.description:
Allow user interaction to zoom and pan on the map, when disabled users cannot change map extent.
Zoom interaction using zoom control, selection interactions like click and selection control are still allowed.

selectOnClick.description: Allow users to select features on the map by clicking on them.

lassoEnabled.description: Freehand selection is enabled by default, users won't have to click selection tool to enable selection.

style.description: Configure data style applied to all data layers. Individual layer styles can be configure from their respective data layer settings.

pointStyle.description:
Display style for point data.
Cluster - Spatially group points into clusters.
Heatmap - Display density/magnitude of features on map as heatmap

pointSymbol.description:
Symbol used to draw point features on map.
Colour Icon along with fill colour setting can be used to colour code icons, use a black icon image with transparent background.

pointIcon.description: URL / Base64 string / SVG XML of an image to represent points on the map. Image URLs should be served over HTTPS and have CORS enabled.

iconRotation.description: Number of degrees to rotate point symbol in clockwise direction from the north. Useful to represent orientation of points

pointSize.description: Size of the symbol in pixel units used to represent points. Should be a positive value, negative values will be parsed to positive values.

lineWidth.description: Line width in pixel units used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineColour.description: Colour used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineTransparency.description: Transparency of lines, polygon and point borders

fillColour.description: Fill colour used to represent polygon and point symbols. When point symbol is set to colour icon, icons are shaded using this colour.

transparency.description: Transparency of polygon and point symbols

heatmapWeight.description: Weight of each data point on the intensity of heatmap apperance.

heatmapRadius.description: Radius of data points in pixel. Higher radius will spread heatmap to greater distance.

heatmapBlur.description: Blur distance for each data point in pixel. Higher blur will produce smoother heatmap.

labelstyle.description: Configure label style applied to all data layers

labelMinZoom.description: Minimum zoom level at which labels will be visible.

labelAlignment.description: Horizontal alignment of label relative to symbol

labelBaseline.description: Vertical alignment of label relative to symbol

labelOffsetX.description: Offset label position in X direction, in pixel units

labelOffsetY.description: Offset Label position in Y direction, in pixel units

labelLongTexts.description:
Configure how long label texts are handled. 
Shorten - Texts over 12 characters are trimmed. 
Wrap - Texts over 16 characters are wrapped. 
Normal - Texts are displayed as is with no changes.

unmatchedstyle.description: Symbol used to draw unmatched point features on map.

pointIcon.description: URL / Base64 string / SVG XML of an image to represent points on the map. Image URLs should be served over HTTPS and have CORS enabled.

iconRotation.description: Number of degrees to rotate point symbol in clockwise direction from the north. Useful to represent orientation of points

pointSize.description: Size of the symbol in pixel units used to represent points. Should be a positive value, negative values will be parsed to positive values.

lineWidth.description: Line width in pixel units used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineColour.description: Colour used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineTransparency.description: Transparency of lines, polygon and point borders

fillColour.description: Fill colour used to represent polygon and point symbols. When point symbol is set to colour icon, icons are shaded using this colour.

transparency.description: Transparency of polygon and point symbols

dataLayer0.description: Configure data layer properties for representing Latitude / Longitude and WKT measure fields

projection.description:
Projection system of data in this data layer, should be an EPSG projection code. Valid values can be looked up at https://epsg.io/. 
Not required to be same as map projection, data will be projected to map projection on the fly.

attribution.description: Provide attribution to this data source, will be included in attribution control when this layer is visible

showLabel.description:
Display label for features on the map. 
Cluster point style will always display number of features in the cluster.
Labels are not displayed when point style is heatmap.

label.description: Label text, use expression to specify field value.

overrideStyle.description: Customize this data layer style by overriding default style.

pointStyle.description:
Display style for point data.
Cluster - Spatially group points into clusters.
Heatmap - Display density/magnitude of features on map as heatmap

pointSymbol.description:
Symbol used to draw point features on map.
Colour Icon along with fill colour setting can be used to colour code icons, use a black icon image with transparent background.

pointIcon.description: URL / Base64 string / SVG XML of an image to represent points on the map. Image URLs should be served over HTTPS and have CORS enabled.

iconRotation.description: Number of degrees to rotate point symbol in clockwise direction from the north. Useful to represent orientation of points

pointSize.description: Size of the symbol in pixel units used to represent points. Should be a positive value, negative values will be parsed to positive values.

lineWidth.description: Line width in pixel units used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineColour.description: Colour used to represent lines, polygon and point borders

lineTransparency.description: Transparency of lines, polygon and point borders

fillColour.description: Fill colour used to represent polygon and point symbols. When point symbol is set to colour icon, icons are shaded using this colour.

transparency.description: Transparency of polygon and point symbols

heatmapWeight.description: Weight of each data point on the intensity of heatmap apperance.

heatmapRadius.description: Radius of data points in pixel. Higher radius will spread heatmap to greater distance.

heatmapBlur.description: Blur distance for each data point in pixel. Higher blur will produce smoother heatmap.

dataLayer1.description: Configure properties for data Layer to be mapped with first category column

dataLayer.description:
URL to a remote service providing data for this data layer. Supports ArcGIS feature service layer, GeoJson and KML. 
Data should be served over HTTPS and have CORS enabled

joinField.description: ID field from this data layer used to join with catgeory field. Consider this as a left join with this data layer on the left.

projection.description:
Projection system of data in this data layer, should be an EPSG projection code. Valid values can be looked up at https://epsg.io/. 
Not required to be same as map projection, data will be projected to map projection on the fly.

dataStrategy.description: Defines how data is loaded from remote source. Applicable only for ArcGIS feature service layer.

maxFeatures.description: Maximum number of features to load from remote source for this layer. Applicable only for ArcGIS feature service layer.

showUnmatched.description: Show features which were not matched to a catgeory on the map. Features will be symbolised using 'Unmatched Style' properties

attribution.description: Provide attribution to this data source, will be included in attribution control when this layer is visible

showLabel.description:
Display label for features on the map. 
Cluster point style will always display number of features in the cluster.
Labels are not displayed when point style is heatmap.

label.description: Label text, use expression to specify field value.

overrideStyle.description: Customize this data layer style by overriding default style.

heatmapRadius.description: Radius of data points in pixel. Higher radius will spread heatmap to greater distance.

heatmapBlur.description: Blur distance for each data point in pixel. Higher blur will produce smoother heatmap.

dataLayer2.description: Configure properties for data Layer to be mapped with second category field.

dataLayer.description: URL to a remove service providing map data. Supports ArcGIS Feature Service, WFS etc.

joinField.description: ID field to relate this data layer to catgeory field

projection.description: Projection system for this data, should be an EPSG code (https://epsg.io/)

dataStrategy.description: Loading strategy for loading data to map.

maxFeatures.description: Maximum Features to load for this layer

showUnmatched.description: Show unmatched features not referenced by catgeory on the map. Features will be symbolised using 'Unmatched Style' properties

attribution.description: Provide attribution to this data source, will be included in attribution control when this layer is visible
